title: Quick bean and vegetable curry
ingredients: ['2 large potatoes cut into small cubes', '2 large carrots cut into small cubes', '50g (2 oz) frozen corn', '50g (2 oz) frozen peas', '1 large onion finely sliced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '75ml (5 tablespoons) water, or as needed', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, rinsed and drained', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, rinsed and drained', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '½ teaspoon turmeric powder', '½ teaspoon chilli powder (depending on taste)', '½ teaspoon cumin powder', '½ teaspoon coriander powder', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', 'salt to taste']
